Enid.Lamerton House:
The Lamerton House is a historic house constructed in 1930 located on the 40-acre (16 ha) Lamerton Terrace property Enid, Oklahoma in Garfield County.


== Description and history ==
The two-story Tudor Revival style home was designed in 1928 by John Duncan Forsyth of Tulsa, Oklahoma for Dr. William E. Lamerton and his wife, Grace T. Lamerton.
